name: Ro-Station
description:
Welcome to our newest installation on the surface of Mars: the Ro-Station!

Counting with the most modern technology available, this compact space port allows you to continue your space travel in case you get lost in the middle of nowhere, just beware of the unexpected visits!

Ro-Station is a game where you're tasked to manage resources in order to refuel and trace a new route back to your home planet.

In order to do so you will have to spin the rotatory disks and access the different machines around the station. You can also move those machines to access the radio waves needed to trace a new route back home and get rid of those pesky aliens trying to get your energy!

Use W, A, S, D or the arrow keys to move around the Ro-Station and use the mouse to get a better view of the environment, needed to visualize near attacks and meteorites with fuel!

When you have all the information  needed to get back to your home planet, embark the space ship and fly to the starts again!

Good luck captain!

This game was made by Pablo Terés Pueyo  under 48 hours for the Kenney Game Jam 2021.

https://twitter.com/Grulemart
